Artifact Updates Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2020-04-12  | Version: 0.1.0
Artifact Updates Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

updates:report

Note:This goal should be used as a Maven report.

Full name:

org.honton.chas:updates-maven-plugin:0.1.0:report

Description:

Generate report of available updates

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: runtime.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: verify.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
<qualifierRegex> String - Regular expression of qualifiers that will be accepted. Any updates that have a qualifier and do not match the expression will not be reported. This is to prevent a false report on -SNAPSHOT, -RC, .alpha, .beta, etc.
Default value is: (?i:Final|GA|Release).
User property is: updates.qualifier.
<reportName> String - Output report name
Default value is: dependency-updates-report.xml.
User property is: updates.report.
<retrievalThreadCount> int - Number of threads to retrieve dependency updates
Default value is: 8.
User property is: updates.threads.
<skip> boolean - Skip generating report
User property is: updates.skip.

Parameter Details

<qualifierRegex>

Regular expression of qualifiers that will be accepted. Any updates that have a qualifier and do not match the expression will not be reported. This is to prevent a false report on -SNAPSHOT, -RC, .alpha, .beta, etc.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: updates.qualifier
  • Default: (?i:Final|GA|Release)

<reportName>

Output report name
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: updates.report
  • Default: dependency-updates-report.xml

<retrievalThreadCount>

Number of threads to retrieve dependency updates
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • User Property: updates.threads
  • Default: 8

<skip>

Skip generating report
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: updates.skip
